org.phantomapi.wraith

Class PhantomNPCWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.phantomapi.wraith.PhantomNPCWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TagProvider, NPCWrapper
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PhantomWraith

    public class PhantomNPCWrapper
extends Object
implements NPCWrapper, TagProvider
    Phantom NPC Wrapper implementation
    Author:
    cyberpwn
